TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpListenerElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class HttpListenerElement Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 表示組態檔中的 HttpListener 項目。

span.span: Represents the HttpListener element in the configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此類別會對應到\ 項目 （網路設定） 的組態項目。This class corresponds to the \ Element (Network Settings) configuration element. 這個類別會提供以程式設計方式存取可以儲存在組態檔中的資訊。This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files. 屬性會指出如果使用原始未逸出的 URI，而不是轉換的 URI，其中任何百分比編碼的值會轉換，並且會採取其他的正規化步驟。The property indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI where any percent-encoded values are converted and other normalization steps are taken. 當執行個體收到的要求，透過`http.sys`服務，它會建立所提供的 URI 字串的執行個體`http.sys`，並公開為屬性。When a instance receives a request through the `http.sys` service, it creates an instance of the URI string provided by `http.sys`, and exposes it as the property. `http.sys`服務會公開兩個要求的 URI 字串：The `http.sys` service exposes two request URI strings: - 原始 URIRaw URI - 轉換的 URIConverted URI 未經處理的 URI 是HTTP 要求的要求行中提供：The raw URI is the provided in the request line of a HTTP request: `GET /path/` `Host: www.contoso.com` 所提供的原始 URI`http.sys`前面所述，此要求是"/ 路徑 /"。The raw URI provided by `http.sys` for the request mentioned above, is "/path/". 這表示透過網路傳送下列 HTTP 動詞命令的字串。This represents the string following the HTTP verb as it was sent over the network. `http.sys`服務會使用 HTTP 要求行中所提供的 URI 要求中所提供的資訊來建立轉換的 URI 和主機標頭，以判斷原始伺服器要求應該轉送到。The `http.sys` service creates a converted URI from the information provided in the request by using the URI provided in the HTTP request line and the Host header to determine the origin server the request should be forwarded to. 這是藉由比較從已註冊的 URI 前置詞的一組與要求的資訊。This is done by comparing the information from the request with a set of registered URI prefixes. 此轉換的 URI，做為 HTTP Server SDK 文件是指[HTTP_COOKED_URL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108)結構。The HTTP Server SDK documentation refers to this converted URI as the [HTTP_COOKED_URL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108) structure. 為了能夠比較要求，並已註冊的 URI 前置詞，要求一些正規化必須完成。In order to be able to compare the request with registered URI prefixes, some normalization to the request needs to be done. 上述轉換的 URI 範例會是，如下所示：For the sample above the converted URI would be as follows: `http://www.contoso.com/path/` `http.sys`服務結合了屬性值，並建立轉換的 URI 要求行中的字串。The `http.sys` service combines the property value and the string in the request line to create a converted URI. 颾魤 ㄛ`http.sys`而類別也會執行下列動作：In addition, `http.sys` and the class also do the following: - 取消-逸出所有百分比編碼的值。Un-escapes all percent encoded values. - 將百分比編碼為 utf-16 字元表示法的非 ASCII 字元。Converts percent-encoded non-ASCII characters into a UTF-16 character representation. 請注意，Unicode 字元 （Unicode 編碼使用 %uxxxx 格式） 以及支援 utf-8 和 ANSI/DBCS 字元。Note that UTF-8 and ANSI/DBCS characters are supported as well as Unicode characters (Unicode encoding using the %uXXXX format). - 執行其他的正規化步驟，例如路徑壓縮。Executes other normalization steps, like path compression. 因為要求未包含任何百分比編碼的值使用的編碼方式相關資訊，它可能無法判斷正確的編碼方式，就只是藉由剖析的百分比編碼的值。Since the request doesn't contain any information about the encoding used for percent-encoded values, it may not be possible to determine the correct encoding just by parsing the percent-encoded values. 因此`http.sys`提供兩個登錄機碼修改程序：Therefore `http.sys` provides two registry keys for modifying the process: |登錄機碼Registry Key|預設值Default Value|描述Description| |------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |EnableNonUTF8EnableNonUTF8|11|如果是零，`http.sys`接受僅 UTF-8 編碼的 Url。If zero, `http.sys` accepts only UTF-8-encoded URLs.

如果不是零，`http.sys`也接受 ANSI 編碼或 DBCS 編碼在要求中的 Url。If non-zero, `http.sys` also accepts ANSI-encoded or DBCS-encoded URLs in requests.| |FavorUTF8FavorUTF8|11|如果不是零，`http.sys`一律要解碼的 URL 為 utf-8 第一次; 如果該轉換會失敗，而且 EnableNonUTF8 為非零的嘗試，Http.sys，然後嘗試將它解碼為 ANSI 或 DBCS。If non-zero, `http.sys` always tries to decode a URL as UTF-8 first; if that conversion fails and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero, Http.sys then tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS.

如果是零 （和 EnableNonUTF8 為非零）`http.sys`嘗試將它解碼為 ANSI 或 DBCS; 如果不成功，它嘗試 utf-8 轉換。If zero (and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero), `http.sys` tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS; if that is not successful, it tries a UTF-8 conversion.| 當收到要求時，它會使用轉換的 URI，從`http.sys`來作為輸入屬性。When receives a request, it uses the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. 沒有需要支援在 Uri 中的字元和數字以外的字元。There is a need for supporting characters besides characters and numbers in URIs. 舉例來說，下列 URI，用來擷取客戶的客戶資訊數字"1/3812 」:An example is the following URI, which is used to retrieve customer information for customer number "1/3812": `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1%2F3812')/` 請注意百分比編碼中的斜線的 Uri (%2f)。Note the percent-encoded slash in the Uri (%2F). 這是必要的因為在此情況下的斜線字元代表的資料，不是路徑分隔符號。This is necessary, since in this case the slash character represents data and not a path delimiter. 將字串傳遞至 Uri 建構函式會導致下列 URI:Passing the string to Uri constructor will lead to the following URI: `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1/3812')/` 將路徑分割成其區段，會導致下列項目：Splitting the path into its segments would result in the following elements: `Customer('1` `3812')` 這不是要求的寄件者的意圖。This is not the intent of the sender of the request. 如果屬性設為 false，則當收到要求時，它會使用原始 URI，而不是從轉換的 URI`http.sys`來作為輸入屬性。If the property is set to false, then when the receives a request, it uses the raw URI instead of the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Timeouts As HttpListenerTimeoutsElement

summary.span: 取得用於 物件的預設逾時項目。

span.span: Gets the default timeout elements used for an object.

value.span: 用於 物件的逾時項目。

span.span: The timeout elements used for an object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnescapeRequestUrl As Boolean
public: property bool UnescapeRequestUrl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指出 使用原始未逸出 URI，而非轉換的 URI。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI.

value.span: 布林值，指出 使用原始未逸出 URI，而非轉換的 URI。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI, rather than the converted URI.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性會指出如果使用原始未逸出的 URI，而不是轉換的 URI，其中任何百分比編碼的值會轉換，並且會採取其他的正規化步驟。The property indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI where any percent-encoded values are converted and other normalization steps are taken. 當執行個體收到的要求，透過`http.sys`服務，它會建立所提供的 URI 字串的執行個體`http.sys`，並公開為屬性。When a instance receives a request through the `http.sys` service, it creates an instance of the URI string provided by `http.sys`, and exposes it as the property. `http.sys`服務會公開兩個要求的 URI 字串：The `http.sys` service exposes two request URI strings: - 原始 URIRaw URI - 轉換的 URIConverted URI 未經處理的 URI 是HTTP 要求的要求行中提供：The raw URI is the provided in the request line of a HTTP request: `GET /path/` `Host: www.contoso.com` 所提供的原始 URI`http.sys`前面所述，此要求是"/ 路徑 /"。The raw URI provided by `http.sys` for the request mentioned above, is "/path/". 這表示透過網路傳送下列 HTTP 動詞命令的字串。This represents the string following the HTTP verb as it was sent over the network. `http.sys`服務會使用 HTTP 要求行中所提供的 URI 要求中所提供的資訊來建立轉換的 URI 和主機標頭，以判斷原始伺服器要求應該轉送到。The `http.sys` service creates a converted URI from the information provided in the request by using the URI provided in the HTTP request line and the Host header to determine the origin server the request should be forwarded to. 這是藉由比較從已註冊的 URI 前置詞的一組與要求的資訊。This is done by comparing the information from the request with a set of registered URI prefixes. 此轉換的 URI，做為 HTTP Server SDK 文件是指[HTTP_COOKED_URL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108)結構。The HTTP Server SDK documentation refers to this converted URI as the [HTTP_COOKED_URL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=166108) structure. 為了能夠比較要求，並已註冊的 URI 前置詞，要求一些正規化必須完成。In order to be able to compare the request with registered URI prefixes, some normalization to the request needs to be done. 上述轉換的 URI 範例會是，如下所示：For the sample above the converted URI would be as follows: `http://www.contoso.com/path/` `http.sys`服務結合了屬性值，並建立轉換的 URI 要求行中的字串。The `http.sys` service combines the property value and the string in the request line to create a converted URI. 颾魤 ㄛ`http.sys`而類別也會執行下列動作：In addition, `http.sys` and the class also do the following: - 取消-逸出所有百分比編碼的值。Un-escapes all percent encoded values. - 將百分比編碼為 utf-16 字元表示法的非 ASCII 字元。Converts percent-encoded non-ASCII characters into a UTF-16 character representation. 請注意，Unicode 字元 （Unicode 編碼使用 %uxxxx 格式） 以及支援 utf-8 和 ANSI/DBCS 字元。Note that UTF-8 and ANSI/DBCS characters are supported as well as Unicode characters (Unicode encoding using the %uXXXX format). - 執行其他的正規化步驟，例如路徑壓縮。Executes other normalization steps, like path compression. 因為要求未包含任何百分比編碼的值使用的編碼方式相關資訊，它可能無法判斷正確的編碼方式，就只是藉由剖析的百分比編碼的值。Since the request doesn't contain any information about the encoding used for percent-encoded values, it may not be possible to determine the correct encoding just by parsing the percent-encoded values. 因此`http.sys`提供兩個登錄機碼修改程序：Therefore `http.sys` provides two registry keys for modifying the process: |登錄機碼Registry Key|預設值Default Value|描述Description| |------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |EnableNonUTF8EnableNonUTF8|11|如果是零，`http.sys`接受僅 UTF-8 編碼的 Url。If zero, `http.sys` accepts only UTF-8-encoded URLs.

如果不是零，`http.sys`也接受 ANSI 編碼或 DBCS 編碼在要求中的 Url。If non-zero, `http.sys` also accepts ANSI-encoded or DBCS-encoded URLs in requests.| |FavorUTF8FavorUTF8|11|如果不是零，`http.sys`一律要解碼的 URL 為 utf-8 第一次; 如果該轉換會失敗，而且 EnableNonUTF8 為非零的嘗試，Http.sys，然後嘗試將它解碼為 ANSI 或 DBCS。If non-zero, `http.sys` always tries to decode a URL as UTF-8 first; if that conversion fails and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero, Http.sys then tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS.

如果是零 （和 EnableNonUTF8 為非零）`http.sys`嘗試將它解碼為 ANSI 或 DBCS; 如果不成功，它嘗試 utf-8 轉換。If zero (and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero), `http.sys` tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS; if that is not successful, it tries a UTF-8 conversion.| 當收到要求時，它會使用轉換的 URI，從`http.sys`來作為輸入屬性。When receives a request, it uses the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. 沒有需要支援在 Uri 中的字元和數字以外的字元。There is a need for supporting characters besides characters and numbers in URIs. 舉例來說，下列 URI，用來擷取客戶的客戶資訊數字"1/3812 」:An example is the following URI, which is used to retrieve customer information for customer number "1/3812": `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1%2F3812')/` 請注意百分比編碼中的斜線的 Uri (%2f)。Note the percent-encoded slash in the Uri (%2F). 這是必要的因為在此情況下的斜線字元代表的資料，不是路徑分隔符號。This is necessary, since in this case the slash character represents data and not a path delimiter. 將字串傳遞至 Uri 建構函式會導致下列 URI:Passing the string to Uri constructor will lead to the following URI: `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1/3812')/` 將路徑分割成其區段，會導致下列項目：Splitting the path into its segments would result in the following elements: `Customer('1` `3812')` 這不是要求的寄件者的意圖。This is not the intent of the sender of the request. 如果屬性設為 false，則當收到要求時，它會使用原始 URI，而不是從轉換的 URI`http.sys`來作為輸入屬性。If the property is set to false, then when the receives a request, it uses the raw URI instead of the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property.
